subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Dale Earnhardt Jr. said he knew some fans were upset by his plan to drive a replica of his father’s No. 3 car at Daytona in July, but he thought it was a fitting way to honor his father.
snippet: Dale Earnhardt Jr. said he knew some fans were upset by his plan to drive a replica of his father’s No. 3 car at Daytona in July, but he thought it was a fitting way to honor his father.
